docs.snippet: An Army officer stripped of a medal for heroism under fire and his right to call himself a Green Beret is fighting for his military career after accusations he tracked down and killed a suspected bomb-maker in Afghanistan....

headline.main: Army Weighs if Ex-Green Beret Hero Should Be Dismissed

docs.snippet: The state attorney’s office is looking into cases by two police officers in Miami Beach who exchanged about 230 emails containing racist and sexist jokes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state attorney’s office is looking into cases by two police officers in Miami Beach who exchanged about 230 emails containing racist and sexist jokes.
docs.abstract: Florida state attorney's office of Miami-Dade County is reviewing more than 150 criminal cases of black suspects arrested by police officers in Miami Beach after revelation that two ranking officers in department sent numerous racist emails; cases in question are those in which officers who received or sent emails were involved.

headline.main: Racist Police Emails Put Florida Cases in Doubt
headline.print_headline: Racist Police Emails Put Florida Cases in Doubt
